weights.heading: 400 (Regular) and 700 (Bold) - Use Italic often for emphasis

usage_rules.background: Use #FAF9F6 for the main page background. Avoid pure white.
usage_rules.gold_accents: Use #D4AF37 for buttons, borders, and key highlights. Do NOT overuse.
usage_rules.text: Use #2C2C2C for body text. Never use pure black.
usage_rules.gradients: FORBIDDEN. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the entire body with 3% opacity to kill the digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid #D1C7B7 (Warm Grey) for cards. 1px solid #D4AF37 (Gold) for active states.

grid_system.gallery: Masonry Layout (use CSS columns or react-responsive-masonry). DO NOT use a standard square grid.

PhotographerHeader.description: Top section with branding and contact info.

elements.name: Brand Name
elements.style: text-5xl md:text-7xl font-heading italic text-center mb-8
elements.animation: Use a CSS animation to simulate a 'glitch' or 'reveal' effect to mimic a GIF. Text: 'Wedding Clickz Photography'

elements.name: Contact Bar
elements.icons: Use react-icons (FaWhatsapp, FaInstagram, FaYoutube). WhatsApp icon must be Green (#25D366).

PortfolioMarquee.description: A continuous scrolling strip of the photographer's best work.
PortfolioMarquee.style: h-[400px] w-full overflow-hidden relative flex items-center bg-secondary/30

CoupleShowcase.typography: Names in 'Great Vibes' (text-6xl md:text-8xl text-accent). 'Weds' in 'Manrope' (uppercase tracking-widest text-sm).

LiveGallery.style: columns-1 md:columns-3 gap-4 space-y-4 px-4 md:px-12
LiveGallery.behavior: Auto-refresh every 10 seconds to fetch new images from S3/Backend.
LiveGallery.empty_state: Elegant message: 'Capturing moments... Photos appearing soon.'

UploadDashboard.style: Clean, functional, Shadcn-based. Use 'Card' component for upload zone.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'react-icons', 'framer-motion' (for marquee/transitions), and 'clsx' 'tailwind-merge' if missing.
2. THEME: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to include the custom colors and fonts defined above. Extend the theme, do not overwrite defaults completely.
3. LAYOUT: Build the 'GuestView' as a single scrolling page. Build 'Dashboard' as a protected route.
4. ANIMATION: The 'Photographer Name' MUST be animated. Use Framer Motion or CSS keyframes to make it slide up or fade in letter by letter.
5. REAL-TIME: Implement a 'useInterval' hook in the Gallery component to poll the backend every 10s.
6. MOCKING: If backend is not ready, mock the 'fetchPhotos' call to return the 'portfolio_images' list so the UI can be verified.
7. TESTING: Ensure all interactive elements (Upload button, Social links) have the 'data-testid' attributes specified.
universal_guidelines: Use 'sonner' for toast notifications (e.g., 'New photo arrived!').
